plot: When farmer Rog dies, his son Peter stays, but Johannes can not be satisfied with such a condition (and servant Maria's love) and finds a job as old Count Rudenberg's secretary. His ambition leads him to charm Gerda, the Count's unique daughter. But when he discovers that Count's second wife Helga will soon inherit a field that only he knows his underground is full with petroleum, he changes his allegiance... Greed and death.   Written by  Yepok
title: La tierra en llamas

cast.name: Lya De Putti

cast.role: Helga, Rudenburgs zweite Frau / Helga, Rudenburg's 2nd wife
